channel.title: (Minecraft Hack Client) - Release 1 - NoCheat Bypasses, Better FPS, Hotkeys
channel.description:
APCG Client out for download. Most credits go to the developer of Razor Client (awesome guy) for his base, but the bypasses for the newer versions of Bukkit/updated servers/newer plugins were all done by me. We now have a new client/website developer, so we don't need this anymore, I guess. I'll update it once (when new Minecraft comes out).
Also, some of you are probably sketchy and think there is a lastlogin stealer in this; there's not. I didn't even obfuscate it, so go ahead and decompile everything if you want. I won't release the SRC for those skids that can't decompile a client correctly.
Video explains how to get it. Here's a video of it:
Here are also some of our griefing videos (the girl thinks I'm CaptainSparklez):

item.title: (Minecraft Hack Client) - Release 1 - NoCheat Bypasses, Better FPS, Hotkeys
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

We don’t allow nor condone childish cheating in Moparcraft and the griefing videos you posted are just unacceptable.

Read full topic

I agree, we should start a vote to make this the new default client.[/quote]+1
